meanings: (쓰레기 등을) throw away, throw out, dump, (informal) junk
(포기하다, 떠나다) desert, leave, abandon, (literary) forsake, give up

vlive.korean: 근데 그전에 샴페인 좀 떼버려도 돼요? Before that, can I remove that Champagne? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#415. 힙퀸 (스페셜 DJ 마마무 문별 & 솔라 with 마마무)
vlive.english: Before that, can I remove that Champagne?

vlive.korean: 이거 버려도 되나? - 응 그거 버려도 돼. Can I throw this out? - Yes, you can throw it out. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Stray Kids(스트레이 키즈) : SKZ-TALKER(슼즈토커)] Ep.09
vlive.english: Can I throw this out? - Yes, you can throw it out.

vlive.korean: 그럴까요? 그냥 스포일러 해버려도 되는 거예요? Can we give a spoiler to fans? 듣기 View video KBS예능 : 안녕하세요 X TWICE 녹화장 라이브 / Hello counselor X TWICE Behind the scenes
vlive.english: Can we give a spoiler to fans?

vlive.korean: 이거 마음에 안 드는데 이 이모티콘 되게 마음에 안 드는데? - 그거 버려도 돼. I don't like this emoticon. - You can throw that out. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Stray Kids(스트레이 키즈) : SKZ-TALKER(슼즈토커)] Ep.09
vlive.english: I don't like this emoticon. - You can throw that out.

vlive.korean: 이거 버려도 되요. You can throw it away. 듣기 View video YGK+ : Holly Moly 폭염이라니 ! 모델 이호정

examples.korean: Those old clothes can be chucked out. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 헌옷들은 버려도 돼. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Those old clothes can be chucked out. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I don’t need that—you can throw it away. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 그거 필요 없어. 버려도 돼. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I don’t need that—you can throw it away. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You can scratch my name off the list. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 명단에서 제 이름은 지워 버려도 돼요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You can scratch my name off the list. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Could you sort out the toys that can be thrown away? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 버려도 되는 장난감들을 가려내 줄 수 있겠어요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Could you sort out the toys that can be thrown away? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You can throw those away—they’re no use to anyone. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것들은 버려도 돼. 그건 아무에게도 쓸모없으니까. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You can throw those away—they’re no use to anyone. Add to Wordbook
